Summary I am an Instructional Designer/eLearning Developer with over eight years’ experience creating eLearning/wbt projects. 
 
Objective: To create from scratch or predetermined format, exceptional eLearning modules that compels the end user to want to perform the desired training. 
 
My Responsibilities during this timeframe include the following: 
 
* Develop curriculum and build the eLearning module  
* Take predetermined layouts and designs and turn them into engaging eLearnings 
* Design and script large, complex interactive projects for local and national clients in a creative, team-oriented environment 
* Develop storyboard/script with text, voice, sound, graphics, and descriptions and then create the eLearning/wbt using these features 
* Develop and manage the project schedule 
* Manage the review and revision cycles 
* Report on task and deliverable completions 
* QA testing of produced content 
* Attend team meetings  
* Help ensure consistency with established course design strategy  
* Create templates and stay within company established trademark and design rules 
 
 
Skills: 
* Thorough understanding of adult learning theory and instructional design process 
* Conceptual thinker, team player 
* Excellent communication skills with clients and coworkers 
* Attention to detail and strong work ethic 
* Remote worker for past 10 years (have a complete home/office with a subscription to Adobe Captivate (currently using 7.0) and new upgrade 8.0 coming) 
* Certified in Information Mapping (this is a type of writing that teaches you to “chunk” data into useable segments for best knowledge transfer to the end user)

Summary I am a creative media specialist. I have roots in professional still photography dating back to 1996 when I first started William Foster Photography. In 2013, I incorporated my business and expanded my service offerings to include video. I work with businesses of all size to help them market their services and products through short films that tell their story. My goal is to change the landscape of web marketing to be more meaningful through short films that connect people to the human side of businesses.  
 
Over the years, I have been an Instructional Designer at Intel Corporation, a professional photographer, Official Photographer for Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger and a filmmaker. As an instructional designer at Intel, I have been able to use my talents in instructional design and development on a variety of projects. This includes analysis of learning needs, design of learning systems (includes online training, embedded help systems, and instructor-led training), development of learning systems, and evaluation of these systems. I have used the data gathered through learning evaluation to improve the learning systems and influence customers decisions. Specialties:Instructional design using ADDIE.
